title: Ransom Note Recipe
full_text:
Ransom Note Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
For Honey Syrup:
1/4
cup
honey
1/4
cup
hot
water
For the Cocktail:
Ice
2
ounces
Ransom Old Tom Gin
3/4
ounce
honey syrup
3/4
ounce
dry mead
such as Schraml
1/4
ounce
freshly squeezed
lemon juice
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add gin, honey syrup, mead, and lemon.
Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Special Equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Gin
